snippet.title: Producer of Aquaman 2 - "Amber Has ZERO Talent!"
snippet.description:
Producer of Aquaman 2 - "Amber Has ZERO Talent!" 
Peter Safran, the producer of Aquaman 2, has finally given an official statement regarding Amber Heard's role in the movie. The statement came as a surprise to both Johnny Depp and Amber Heard fans and was given during a time when legal tensions between the former couple were at an all-time high. Safran has explained the future of Amber Heard in the upcoming movie and even addressed the petitions by Johnny Depp fans to have her removed from the movie altogether. How have the fans reacted to this and is Amber’s role in Aquaman 2 at risk?

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments!
